title: News Briefs 30-09-2020
cleaned_text:
The debate moderator we all need…
• Did the early Christians use psychedelics?
• Scientists reveal more about the volcanic eruption that rocked the ancient Maya.
• The mystery of the ‘Baghdad batteries’.
• How a secret map brought down a secret pirate alliance on the Irish coast.
• Area 51 has a huge new hangar facility that points to a drone swarm future.
• MIT researchers say their fusion reactor is “very likely to work“.
• Birds learned a new song during the pandemic.
• Did pterosaurs have feathers? Scientific debate takes flight in new study.
• Astronauts finally find location of the elusive leak on the International Space Station.
• The chilling experiment which created the first vaccine.
• Radical discovery suggests the solar system has two planes of orbital alignment.

Thanks to Kali, Gerald, Ryan and Debra for your support!

Quote of the Day:

No matter how outrageous a lie may be, it will be accepted if stated loudly enough and often enough.
